creator: rekha.kyathsandra@yaragos.com
text: There was an error sending mail from 'bugzilla-daemon@' to 'revan.vijayakumar@yaragos.com':Can't call method "address" on an undefined value at C:/Program Files (x86)/Bugzilla/perl/perl/site/lib/Email/Send/SMTP.pm line 25.
Bugzilla is used for reporting bona fide, demonstratable Tomcat errors, not for random misuse of the system.
creator: chuck.caldarale@unisys.com
